title: Color
description: The best tools for creating color schemes for your designs!

resources.title: Adobe Color
resources.description: Create beautiful color themes!

resources.title: BrandColors
resources.description: The biggest collection of official brand color codes around.

resources.title: Branition Colors
resources.description: Hand-curated collection of color palettes best fitted for branding.

resources.title: Color Claim
resources.description: Color Claim was created in 2012 by Tobias van Schneider with the goal to collect & combine unique colors for your future projects.

resources.title: Color Hunt
resources.description: Color Hunt is a free and open platform for color inspiration with thousands of trendy hand-picked color palettes.

resources.title: Color Oracle
resources.description: Color Oracle is a free color blindness simulator for Windows, Mac and Linux.

resources.title: Colorable
resources.description: Contrast is the difference in luminance or color that makes an object distinguishable.

resources.title: ColorBox
resources.description: A handy color creation tool from the Lyft team.

resources.title: Colordot
resources.description: A handy color picker tool.

resources.title: Colors
resources.description: Mix and match these color classes to create a variety of accessible themes.

resources.title: Colorsinspo
resources.description: Thousands of beautiful color palettes you can use it directly by one click.

resources.title: Colourco
resources.description: Pick colours based on HSL color values.

resources.title: Coolors
resources.description: The super fast color schemes generator!

resources.title: Duo
resources.description: Duo is a collection of colour combinations that I've curated from personal projects or that I've come across on the web.

resources.title: Flat UI Color Picker
resources.description: Total 199 unique colors!

resources.title: Happy Hues
resources.description: Curated colors in context.

resources.title: Hex Colors
resources.description: A collection of free color tools that will help you choose the right color for your next project!

resources.title: HTML Color Codes
resources.description: Get HTML color codes, Hex color codes, RGB and HSL values with our color picker...

resources.title: Leonardo
resources.description: Leonardo is a one-of-a-kind tool for creating, managing, and sharing accessible color systems for user interface design and data visualization.

resources.title: Picular
resources.description: The color of anything!

resources.title: Pigment
resources.description: A handy tool for generating colors.

resources.title: Pilestone
resources.description: Simulate your image by using the colorblind simulator.

resources.title: Randoma11y
resources.description: A handy tool for generating colors.

resources.title: Tint & Shade Generator
resources.description: Produce tints and shades of a given hex color in 10% increments.

resources.title: UI Colors
resources.description: Enter a hexcode and I will create a color family for you.
